name: osmos-product-web-automation-playwright
description: Playwright automation framework for OSMOS product

scripts.pretest: if exist reports\allure-results rmdir /s /q reports\allure-results && if exist reports\allure-report rmdir /s /q reports\allure-report
scripts.allure:clean: if exist reports\allure-results rmdir /s /q reports\allure-results && if exist reports\allure-report rmdir /s /q reports\allure-report
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:clean && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure: npm run allure:clean && set TEST_ENV=qa && playwright test --headed && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
